sentences: In Bangladesh he is the only singer with 13 solo albums of his own lyrics and composition.
His music focuses on class stratification, contemporary urban life, socio-economic, 2013 Shahbag protests and human rights of Bangladesh.
Pritam Ahmed currently resides in England and works as a regular actor in British and Hollywood films.
He recently starred in the BBC-produced "A Very British Scandal" series.
A few days ago, she was also seen as a model in an advertisement for a British car retail company.
